auth.signInDesc: Login to your account for a faster checkout.

contact.emailInvalid: Please provide a valid email address.
contact.title: Contact Creator
contact.message: Have something to say? I am here to help. Fill up the form or send email.

hero.title: Smart Digital Seal Designer - Create Professional Stamps Effortlessly
hero.description: Experience our AI-powered digital seal maker that helps you create professional company seals, contract stamps, and custom digital stamps with just a few clicks.

templates.title: Professional Templates
templates.description: Choose from a variety of professional seal templates including company seals, contract stamps, and more. Customize size, border width, colors, and other parameters to match your needs.

security.title: Anti-counterfeiting Features
security.description: Built-in security pattern generator with customizable pattern density and size. Includes aging effects and burr effects for authentic-looking seals with enhanced security.

customization.title: Fully Customizable
customization.description: Customize every aspect of your seal - from text content and fonts to compression ratio and distribution factors. Add images and inner circles to create unique seal designs.

blog.sectionDescription: Explore our latest articles about digital seals, authentication technology, and professional stamp design.

footer.copyright: Copyright Â© {year} SealDigital. All rights reserved.

blog.title: Digital Stamp Insights & Resources
blog.description: Explore our latest articles about digital seals, authentication technology, and professional stamp design. Stay informed about industry trends and best practices.
blog.articleCount: {count} articles to help you master digital sealing

general.title: General Terms
general.content: By accessing and placing an order with DigitalSeal Studio, you confirm that you are in agreement with and bound by the terms of service contained in the Terms & Conditions outlined below. These terms apply to the entire website and any email or other type of communication between you and DigitalSeal Studio.
general.liability: Under no circumstances shall DigitalSeal Studio team be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental or consequential damages, including, but not limited to, loss of data or profit, arising out of the use, or the inability to use, the materials on this site, even if DigitalSeal Studio team or an authorized representative has been advised of the possibility of such damages.

license.title: License
license.content: DigitalSeal Studio grants you a revocable, non-exclusive, non-transferable, limited license to download, install and use the website strictly in accordance with the terms of this Agreement.

definitions.title: Definitions and Key Terms
definitions.content: To help explain things as clearly as possible in this Terms & Conditions, every time any of these terms are referenced, are strictly defined as:

cookie.name: Cookie
cookie.description: small amount of data generated by a website and saved by your web browser. It is used to identify your browser, provide analytics, remember information about you.

company.name: Company
company.description: when this policy mentions "Company," "we," "us," or "our," it refers to DigitalSeal Studio that is responsible for your information under this Terms & Conditions.

service.name: Service
service.description: refers to the seal creation platform and services provided by DigitalSeal Studio.

website.name: Website
website.description: DigitalSeal Studio's site, which can be accessed via https://sealsdigital.com/

user.name: You
user.description: a person or entity that is registered with DigitalSeal Studio to use the Services.

restrictions.title: Restrictions
restrictions.content: You agree not to, and you will not permit others to:
list: License, sell, rent, lease, assign, distribute, transmit, host, outsource, disclose or otherwise commercially exploit the website or make the platform available to any third party.
Modify, make derivative works of, disassemble, decrypt, reverse compile or reverse engineer any part of the website.
Remove, alter or obscure any proprietary notice of DigitalSeal Studio or its affiliates, partners, suppliers or the licensors of the website.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us through our contact page.
